text: Anata gata wa minaissho ni arrā no omoto ni kaeru. Arrā no yakusoku wa shinjitsudearu. Hontōni kare wa sōzō o hajime, soshite sore o kurikaesa reru. Kore wa shinkō shite zenkō o shita mono ni, kōsei ni mukuwa reru tamedearu. Daga kare o shinkō shinai mono ni wa, nietatta nomimono to, itamashī chōbatsu ga aru. Kore wa kare-ra ga fushinjindeatta tamedearu
